text: Polk County is a county in the northwestern part of the U.S. state of Georgia. As of the 2020 census, the population was 42,853. The county seat is Cedartown. The county was created on December 20, 1851. ==References== Category:1851 establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Georgia (U.S. state) counties
title: Polk County, Georgia
